data.title: RARE PUNK: V
data.text:
RARE PUNK: V - Z + COMPSUPDATE: April 31- 2024

TO PLACE ORDER Email Address / PayPal :

NEKRON425@GMAIL.COM

or if you know your total click the Button Below:

SHIPPING

1 LP packed weighs 1.0 - 1.5 pounds

1 CD or 1 - 7" packed weighs 6 - 8 oz (0.8 pounds)

USA Shipping $4.50

(your choice but i rcomended Insurance)

(add $2.50 for insurance less than $50)

(add $3.00 for insurance less than $100

(add $4.50 for insurance less than $200

(add $5.50 for insurance less than $300

Europe/Asia/Australia

0.1 to 0.8 pounds = $

0.9 to 2.0 pounds = $ (1 - 2 LP)

2.1 to 3.0 pounds = $ (2 - 4 LP)

3.1 to 4.0 pounds = $ (4 - 6 LP)

Canada

0.0 to 0.8 pounds = $

0.9 to 2.0 pounds = $

2.1 to 3.0 pounds = $
